sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you see someone <radical>loiter</radical>ing around with <radical>horns</radical> on their head you'd be <radical>correct</radical> to <kanji>obey</kanji> and <kanji>accompany</kanji> them.
meaningInfo: First of all, this could be really fun. Second of all, if this person is a demon or something, you should really just obey them or they could curse you. What's the worst that could happen?!
readingMnemonic: If you <kanji>obey</kanji> the horned man you'll end up with a ton of <reading>jew</reading>els (<ja>じゅう</ja>)!
readingInfo: You stole those jewels together and now you're an accomplice for accompanying him! You better hide those jewels!!
